questions.questionText: Report of kids throwing rocks from overpass over a busy freeway. Choose the priority of this situation.

options.text: Priority 1 - An immediate threat to life or health
Priority 2 - An immediate threat to property
Priority 3 - A routine report or incident
Priority 4 - A public service or public education

questions.questionText: An employer believes that an absent employee has been stealing funds from the company. Choose the priority of this situation.

options.text: Priority 1 - An immediate threat to life or health
Priority 2 - An immediate threat to property
Priority 3 - A routine report or incident
Priority 4 - A public service or public education
